artist: Editor: Frank Gaard; Artist: Andy Baird; Artist: Mark Bueide; Artist: James DeWitt; Artist: Frank Gaard; Artist: Joe McDonnell; Artist: William McKearn; Artist: Ed Rath; Artist: Keith A. Smith; Artist: Bernard van Marm; Artist: Fritz Wolfmeyer; Artist: Chris Woodward; Publisher: Artpolice, Minneapolis
description: 16 pages, stapled upper-left center, three color printed front cover; black-and-white publication with a few touches of red in cap and pants and of gold in baseball bat; man with bat also carrying a gun in PR hand; art police headquarters on banner behind the man; above banner, 3 windows with action in each window; left side (or back) of cover windows with people and animals in various stages of escape out the windows
inscription:
Inscription

b.) on inside bottom right page handwritten in pencil: Keith (?) March 75 | d.) inside on bottom of both pages handwritten in pencil: For Sam Sadas Artists Proof 6.25.75, Frank Gaard
provenance: MIA Art Reference and Research Library; transfered to MIA, 2015.
title: Artpolice Newsletter, Vol. 2, No.1
